message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.MM

The paper deals with content-based recommendation, which is a subfield of information retrieval (cs.IR). The use of multimodal learning techniques suggests that the paper could also belong to machine learning (cs.LG) and computer vision (cs.CV) subcategories. The proposed modality dropout and multimodal sequential autoencoder are related to deep learning and natural language processing, which could place the paper in the subcategories of computational linguistics (cs.CL) and multimedia (cs.MM).
